prompts.title: Craft an Engaging Instagram Caption
prompts.content: Write an engaging and creative Instagram caption for a post featuring {product_description}. The caption should include {call_to_action} and use relevant {hashtags}. Keep it under 150 characters.
prompts.description: Generates an Instagram caption that promotes a product effectively.

variables.name: product_description
variables.description: A brief description of the product or service featured in the post.
variables.example: a new line of eco-friendly yoga mats

variables.name: call_to_action
variables.description: An action you want the audience to take.
variables.example: Visit our website to learn more

variables.name: hashtags
variables.description: Relevant hashtags to include in the caption.

prompts.title: Compose a Twitter Thread on Industry Trends
prompts.content: Create a Twitter thread discussing the latest trends in {industry}. Include {key_points} and provide insights on {future_predictions}. Each tweet should be concise and engaging.
prompts.description: Generates a Twitter thread to establish thought leadership in a specific industry.

variables.name: industry
variables.description: The industry or sector to discuss.

variables.name: key_points
variables.description: The main points to cover in the thread.
variables.example: advancements in solar technology, government incentives

variables.name: future_predictions
variables.description: Predictions about the industry's future.
variables.example: increased adoption of home solar panels

prompts.title: Develop a LinkedIn Post Highlighting Company Achievements
prompts.content: Write a professional LinkedIn post announcing {achievement}. Mention how this impacts {stakeholders} and include a quote from {company_leader}.
prompts.description: Creates a LinkedIn post to share company achievements with a professional audience.

variables.name: achievement
variables.description: The achievement or milestone to announce.

variables.name: stakeholders
variables.description: Groups affected by the achievement.

variables.name: company_leader
variables.description: Name and title of a leader to quote.

prompts.title: Create a Facebook Event Description
prompts.content: Write a detailed description for a Facebook event titled {event_name}. Include information about {event_details}, {date_time}, and {location}. Encourage users to {call_to_action}.
prompts.description: Generates an engaging description for a Facebook event to attract attendees.

variables.name: event_name
variables.description: The name of the event.

variables.name: event_details
variables.description: Key details about the event.
variables.example: a 5K run to raise funds for local schools

variables.name: date_time
variables.description: Date and time of the event.

variables.name: location
variables.description: Where the event will take place.

variables.name: call_to_action
variables.description: An action to encourage user participation.
variables.example: Sign up now to reserve your spot

prompts.title: Draft a Pinterest Pin Description for a Blog Post
prompts.content: Compose an enticing Pinterest pin description for a blog post about {blog_topic}. Include {keywords} and a {call_to_action} to drive traffic to the blog.
prompts.description: Creates a Pinterest pin description to promote a blog post.

variables.name: blog_topic
variables.description: The main topic of the blog post.

variables.name: keywords
variables.description: SEO keywords to include.

variables.name: call_to_action
variables.description: A prompt encouraging users to read the blog.
variables.example: Click to discover how you can make a difference

prompts.title: Generate a YouTube Video Description
prompts.content: Write a compelling YouTube video description for a video titled {video_title}. Summarize {video_content}, include {links}, and add relevant {hashtags}.
prompts.description: Produces a YouTube video description to increase engagement and SEO.

variables.name: video_title
variables.description: The title of the YouTube video.
variables.example: How to Bake the Perfect Chocolate Cake

variables.name: video_content
variables.description: Key points or topics covered in the video.

variables.name: links
variables.description: Any links to include in the description.
variables.example: recipe blog post, product affiliate links

variables.name: hashtags
variables.description: Relevant hashtags for the video.

prompts.title: Outline a Content Creation Calendar for the Week
prompts.content: Create a Content Creation content plan for {platforms} for the week starting {start_date}. Include {content_types} and align posts with {marketing_goals}.
prompts.description: Generates a weekly Content Creation calendar to organize content strategy.

variables.name: platforms
variables.description: Content Creation platforms to include.

variables.name: start_date
variables.description: The starting date of the week.

variables.name: content_types
variables.description: Types of content to post.
variables.example: blog shares, promotional offers, user testimonials

variables.name: marketing_goals
variables.description: Overall marketing objectives.
variables.example: increase brand awareness, drive website traffic

prompts.title: Write an Influencer Outreach Message
prompts.content: Compose a message to {influencer_name} proposing a collaboration on {campaign_details}. Highlight {brand_values} and suggest {next_steps}.
prompts.description: Creates a professional message to engage influencers for partnerships.

variables.name: influencer_name
variables.description: The name of the influencer.

variables.name: campaign_details
variables.description: Details about the proposed campaign.

variables.name: brand_values
variables.description: Core values of your brand.

variables.name: next_steps
variables.description: Suggested actions to move forward.
variables.example: schedule a call to discuss further

prompts.title: Design a Snapchat Story Script
prompts.content: Develop a script for a Snapchat story promoting {product_service}. Include {key_features} and end with {call_to_action}. Ensure the content is engaging and fits within {snap_duration} seconds.
prompts.description: Creates a script for a Snapchat story to engage viewers and promote offerings.

variables.name: product_service
variables.description: The product or service to promote.

variables.name: key_features
variables.description: Main features or benefits to highlight.

variables.name: call_to_action
variables.description: An action you want viewers to take.

variables.name: snap_duration
variables.description: Total duration of the story.

prompts.title: Plan a TikTok Challenge
prompts.content: Outline a TikTok challenge called {challenge_name}. Describe the {challenge_details}, set {participation_rules}, and define {hashtags} to use.
prompts.description: Designs a TikTok challenge to boost engagement and brand awareness.

variables.name: challenge_name
variables.description: The name of the TikTok challenge.

variables.name: challenge_details
variables.description: What participants need to do in the challenge.
variables.example: create a dance routine to our new song

variables.name: participation_rules
variables.description: Rules for participating in the challenge.
variables.example: must tag our account and use the hashtag

variables.name: hashtags
variables.description: Official hashtags for the challenge.

prompts.title: Compose an Announcement on Reddit
prompts.content: Write a Reddit post announcing {announcement} in the {subreddit} subreddit. Ensure it follows {community_guidelines} and encourages {discussion_point}.
prompts.description: Creates a Reddit post to engage with a community and share news.

variables.name: announcement
variables.description: The news or update to share.
variables.example: the launch of our open-source project

variables.name: subreddit
variables.description: The subreddit to post in.

variables.name: community_guidelines
variables.description: Rules specific to the subreddit.

variables.name: discussion_point
variables.description: A topic to encourage discussion.

prompts.title: Draft a Content Creation Contest Announcement
prompts.content: Create a post announcing a contest on {platform}. Detail the {prize}, {how_to_enter}, and {deadline}. Use an enthusiastic tone to generate excitement.
prompts.description: Generates a contest announcement to boost engagement.

variables.name: platform
variables.description: The Content Creation platform where the contest is held.

variables.name: prize
variables.description: What participants can win.

variables.name: how_to_enter
variables.description: Instructions on how to participate.
variables.example: follow our account and tag three friends

variables.name: deadline
variables.description: The contest end date.

prompts.title: Write a Customer Testimonial Post
prompts.content: Compose a Content Creation post sharing a testimonial from {customer_name}. Include their experience with {product_service} and highlight {key_benefits}. Add {visuals} if applicable.
prompts.description: Creates a post to share positive customer feedback.

variables.name: customer_name
variables.description: Name of the customer (can be first name only).

variables.name: product_service
variables.description: The product or service the customer used.

variables.name: key_benefits
variables.description: Benefits the customer experienced.

variables.name: visuals
variables.description: Any images or videos to include.
variables.example: photo of the customer with a delivered meal

prompts.title: Create a Content Creation Poll
prompts.content: Design a poll for {platform} asking {question}. Provide {options} and encourage users to participate by {call_to_action}.
prompts.description: Generates a Content Creation poll to engage the audience and gather opinions.

variables.name: platform
variables.description: The Content Creation platform to post the poll on.

variables.name: question
variables.description: The question to ask in the poll.
variables.example: Which new feature are you most excited about?

variables.name: options
variables.description: The possible answers for the poll.
variables.example: Option A: Dark Mode, Option B: Voice Commands, Option C: Offline Access

variables.name: call_to_action
variables.description: A prompt encouraging users to vote.

prompts.title: Develop a Content Creation Ad Copy
prompts.content: Write ad copy for {platform} promoting {product_service}. Highlight {unique_selling_points} and include a {call_to_action}. Keep it within {character_limit} characters.
prompts.description: Creates compelling ad copy for Content Creation advertising.

variables.name: platform
variables.description: The platform where the ad will be displayed.

variables.name: product_service
variables.description: The product or service being advertised.

variables.name: unique_selling_points
variables.description: Key features that set the product/service apart.

variables.name: call_to_action
variables.description: An action you want the audience to take.

variables.name: character_limit
variables.description: Maximum number of characters allowed.

prompts.title: Write a Content Creation Bio
prompts.content: Craft a Content Creation bio for {platform} that represents {brand_personality}. Include {keywords} and ensure it fits within the {character_limit} character limit.
prompts.description: Generates a concise and impactful Content Creation bio.

variables.name: platform
variables.description: The Content Creation platform for the bio.

variables.name: brand_personality
variables.description: The voice and personality of the brand.

variables.name: keywords
variables.description: Important keywords to include for searchability.

variables.name: character_limit
variables.description: Maximum characters allowed for the bio.
